argument.name: Watchname
argument.description: The name of a watch created with FILE.WATCH_CREATE().

page.discussion: The FILE.WATCH_DESTROY() function removes a watch set by FILE.WATCH_CREATE().
page.example: file.watch_create("temp_dir", "c:\temp", "F", "my_alert_function()") ? file.watch_enumerate() = temp_dir c:\temp F file.watch_destroy("temp_dir")
